alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 3:42PM AKST until December 07 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. North winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts could form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will continue through Wednesday night. North winds gusting to 30 mph will develop tonight and continue into Wednesday night causing areas of blowing snow with low visibility tonight through Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
